name: portal_licencias
description: Portal web de licencias de RedBorder

scripts.start: export DATABASE_NAME='licenses_RedBorder_db' && export DATABASE_USER='web' && export DATABASE_PASSWORD='web_password' && export MODE_RUN='mode_development' && nodemon --use_strict index.js
scripts.start:test: export DATABASE_NAME='licenses_RedBorder_db_test' && export DATABASE_USER='web' && export DATABASE_PASSWORD='web_password' && export MODE_RUN='mode_test' && nodemon --use_strict index.js
